name: Southern Africa Institute of Aviation Science and Technology (SAIAST)
about: The Southern Africa Institute of Aviation Science and Technology (SAIAST) is a premier institution located at Kenneth Kaunda International Airport in Lusaka, Zambia. As an Authorized Training Center (ATC) recognized by IATA, SAIAST offers a range of specialized courses including Aircraft Marshalling and Ramp Hand Signals, Airline Customer Service, and Airport Operations Fundamentals. The institute provides in-company training solutions in travel, tourism, and hospitality through strategic alliances with highly technical and professional partners. SAIAST is committed to safety and security, fostering a responsible and peaceful environment for all students. With a focus on practical and professional training, SAIAST prepares individuals for careers in aviation, ensuring they are well-equipped to meet industry standards. For more information, contact us at admin@saiast.com or +260-979 061 756. SAIAST is dedicated to excellence in aviation education.
services:
